product_name: Patagonia Re-Tool Snap-T Fleece Pullover - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Patagonia Re-Tool Snap-T fleece pullover for girls is a cozy mid or outer layer she'll never want to take off. Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) high loft fleece provides outstanding warmth and highly breathable, quick-drying comfort. Handwarmer pockets and a stand-up collar provide extra warmth. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: The Patagonia Re-Tool Snap-T fleece pullover for girls is a cozy mid or outer layer she'll never want to take off.
